name: Waterlooplein 3D
description:
Features:

  • 3D reconstruction of Amsterdam Waterloopleinbuurt neighborhood between 1800 and 2000
  • Walk around through the neighborhood
  • Accurate placement of buildings, streets, trees and canals
  • Time travel support
  • Large number of historical photographs and paintings, visible on the exact location where image was taken.
  • Random facades (chosen from 10 generic photo realistic textures)
  • Open source (contributions welcome!): https://github.com/elmarj/waterlooplein3d

More info in Dutch on https://waterlooplein3d.nl/
